name: calendar-generator
description: Automatic calendar generator with PDF export

scripts.lint: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:prettier -- . --write && npm run cmd:eslint -- . --fix && npm run cmd:tsc -- --noEmit
scripts.lint:check: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:prettier -- . --check && npm run cmd:eslint -- . && npm run cmd:tsc -- --noEmit
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run cmd:vite -- build && npm run test
scripts.build:app: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:vite -- build
scripts.test: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:vitest -- run --coverage && npm run cmd:playwright -- test
scripts.test:unit: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:vitest -- run --coverage
scripts.test:watch: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:vitest
scripts.test:ui: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:vitest -- --ui
scripts.test:e2e: npm run generate:holidays && npm run cmd:playwright -- test
